title: No, That’s Not Hima Das’ Family Celebrating Her Gold Medal
subtitle: Viral Video Fact Check: Firstly, the family in the video is not Hima Das’ but Swapna Barman’s who is an Indian heptathlete. Secondly, the video is not only a year old but has also been morphed by adding visuals of Das to the original video.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video is being circulated on social media with the claim that Indian athlete Hima Das’ family cried after watching her win gold for India. The video shows a group of people sitting in front of a television set. While watching something onscreen, a woman breaks down and goes outside the room. The video ends with visuals of Hima Das.

Several social media users have shared the video on Facebook with a similar claim.
